bibl.title: Bronze Hoards from Sais (Sa el-Haggar).
Alexandrian Studies II in Honour of Mostafa el Abbadi
bibl.author: SEIF EL-DIN, Mervat

bibl.note: Museum of Tanta. - I. Bronze hoard of the year 1988-89 (statues, statuettes, instruments). - II. Other bronze finds of the years 1973, 1976, 1980 (statuettes, instruments).
bibl.seg: SEIF EL-DIN Mervat, Bronze Hoards from Sais (Sa el-Haggar).
Alexandrian Studies II in Honour of Mostafa el Abbadi = BSAA 46 (2001) pp. 219-236, 5 pll.
